title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, September 12, 2020
description: It's the birthday of H. L. Mencken (1880-1956), who once called Arkansas “an apex of moronia,” and the legislature there passed a motion to pray for his soul.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of H. L. Mencken (1880-1956), who once called Arkansas “an apex of moronia,” and the legislature there passed a motion to pray for his soul.
